channel.description: Rhel Config root: /etc/httpd Primary config file: /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf Module config: conf.modules.d virtual host config: conf.d Log: /var/log/httpd User: apache httpd.conf used include to reference other files 3 categories Global settings virtualhost instructions for requests that do not match a VirtualHost defenition Virtual host examples: Basic authentication in Apache is configured in Location or Directory blocks SSL might have changed its name to TLS Here, the TLS certificate and key are located in Linux’s central system location, /etc/ssl.
